column4: Just noticed that my "/" is filled up. 6 GB! Anyway, I noticed it during a package installation. My question is, can I remove some space and then upgrade the system? The system downloaded and installed fine but I got: /usr/bin/mandb: can't write to /var/cache/man/15844: No space left on device
JESUS!! 2 GB right there. Why on earth doesn't it clean that automaticly?
